about_the_game:
Welcome to a unique adventure in feudal Japan.

Escaping war and famine your life hangs by a thread. This is everything you need to help you get started. From your humble beginnings as a survivor to the creator of thriving settlements, the guide will help you to become a legend in the Peasant Kingdom.

The Official Guide

Content includes:

  • Overview of the Peasant Kingdom

  • Introduction to Multiplayer

  • Game Settings

  • Important Map Locations

  • Overview of the Crafting System

  • Overview of the Building System

  • Unlockables

  • Information about Shrines and Places of Power

  • NPC and Trader Lists

  • Hunting Tips

and much more!

IMPORTANT INFO: After the "installation", the book will be saved as a PDF in your game folder. You can find them in the game folder of Steam, which can be found in a standard installation under "Steam\SteamApps\common\Sengoku Dynasty".

Note: The Official Guide for Sengoku Dynasty is only availabe in English and German language.
